Actions.Name: Run a flow built with Windows recorder V1 (Legacy)
Actions.Description: A flow will automatically run a set of steps recorded in a single app using Windows recorder (V1).

Actions.Name: Run a flow built with Selenium IDE
Actions.Description: A web flow will automatically run a set of steps recorded in a single web app, using Selenium IDE.

Actions.Name: Run a flow built with Power Automate Desktop
Actions.Description: A flow will automatically run a set of steps built by Power Automate Desktop.
